page.title: 20A VIEW FROM THE COMPILERS
page.content: The Project was carried out by the entire first year of the Grove School and pupils of the John Hunt Junior School.Sixth formers advised the younger children with technical problems. A video was made showing the pupils at work in the local area. The field work was only one of three days taken up by the project, the rest of the time was spent in the classroom where they prepared and collated information. Each pupil designed and produced a booklet on the Balderton area. This work along with materials developed by the teachers involved made up a Domesday display for other pupils to view. Throughout the project it was clear that pupils, staff and members of the community were enthusiastic about the nature of the work. We, the organisers would like to thank those involved.
